br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens

Class LoadingScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BaseScreen
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.LoadingScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class LoadingScreen
extends BaseScreen
    The game assets are loaded in this screen, which shows a progress bar to the player indicating how much of the resources have been loaded.
